TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSource extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 指定从其给打印机送纸的送纸器。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此类<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以获取纸张来源纸盒可用打印机上并分别设置页的纸张来源。
有关打印的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用填充`comboPaperSource`与打印机的组合框的受支持的纸张来源。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>标识为通过正在添加的项提供的显示字符串的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>组合框的属性。 该示例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名为变量`printDoc`存在和特定的组合框都已存在。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]

|属性|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>|

Docs.summary: 获取或设置表示之一的整数值或自定义值。
Docs.value: 表示之一的整数值值或自定义值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示每个整数值<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>成员。 任何大于 256 映射到<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>中<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>枚举，但<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.RawKind%2A>属性将返回实际的整数值。
|整数值|PaperSourceKind 成员| |-------------------|----------------------------| |1|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Upper>| |2|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Lower>| |3|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Middle>| |4|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Manual>| |5|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Envelope>| |6|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.ManualFeed>| |7|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.AutomaticFeed>| |8|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.TractorFeed>| |9|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.SmallFormat>| |10|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeFormat>| |11|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeCapacity>| |14|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Cassette>| |15|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.FormSource>| |256 或更大|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>|

Docs.summary: 获取或设置纸张来源的名称。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 调用此属性时需要显示纸张来源。 纸张来源的名称生成基于<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>属性。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用填充`comboPaperSource`与打印机的组合框的受支持的纸张来源。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>标识为通过正在添加的项提供的显示字符串的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>组合框的属性。 该示例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名为变量`printDoc`存在和特定的组合框都已存在。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]
